channel.title: Troubleshooting on Evocations
channel.description: Recent content in Troubleshooting on Evocations

item.title: Removing Python on Raspbian causes some unforseen problems
item.description: On Raspbian, I was having an issue with Python3. My first instinct was to uninstall and reinstall. Que “I can fix it”: $ sudo apt remove python3 “Oh f#@&” Turns out, Debian (And by extension Raspbian) uses Python for tons of things. Que: Panic. A lot of it. I started mashing CTRL-C In the end it didn’t uninstall too many things, and my terminal was still functioning, so I tried to repair the damage.
